Sequence Information.Peptide Name: DP1 (variant of N-15 Cath-2, synthetic AMPs, Arg-rich, UCLL1)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, avian cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is most similar (80%) toN-15 Cath-2R: 27%, L=F=K: 20%.Activity: active against Gram- E. coli O175:H7 (MIC 16 ug/ml), S. typhimurium NCTC 74 (MIC 32 ug/ml), and Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 9155 (MIC 16 ug/ml). Also active against B. subtilis (MIC 8-16 uM), P. aeruginosa (MIC 32-64 uM), MRSA 43300 or 13883 (MIC 32-64 uM).Toxicity: murine RBC: HC50 216 ug/ml, less hemo.lytic.Structure:  became helical in 50% TFE.
Literature Information.Author: Sharma P, Sharma S, Joshi S, Barman P, Bhatt A, Maan M, Singla N, Rishi P, Ali ME, Preet S, Saini A.2022
Literature Information.Title: Design, characterization and structure-function analysis of novel antimicrobial peptides based on the N-terminal CATH-2 fragment.
